0.Name: Dromite
0.Feat 1 Desc: You gain Blast Shard as a bonus feat.

1.Name: Spriggan
1.Feat 1 Desc: +1 ancestry bonus on attack rolls while staggered.

2.Name: Whom
2.Details: Whoms are humanoid wombats who live in burrows underground.
2.Feat 1 Desc: You have proficiency with martial weapons of the Pick group.
2.Feat 2 Desc: When you make Endure checks as part of a group check or extended challenge, or to Aid Another, roll twice and take the higher result.
2.Feat 3 Desc: You have a burrow speed of 1 square. Your burrow cannot extend too far or it risks caving in; you must double back to the surface after burrowing for 5 squares.

3.Name: Apefolk
3.Languages: Common and one extra language of your choice.
3.Feat 1 Desc: When adjacent to at least two allies, you receive a +1 power bonus to all defenses.
3.Feat 2 Desc: Each apefolk has one of the following powers: *cull the weak* or *rally point*.

4.Name: Automaton
4.Languages: Common and one extra language of your choice.
4.Feat 1 Desc: The first time in an encounter that you are staggered, you gain temporary HP equal to your level.
4.Feat 2 Desc: You do not make death saving throws. You still die if reduced to negative hit points equal to your maximum hit points. You do not sleep, breathe, eat or drink.

5.Name: Baldanar
5.Languages: Common and one extra language of your choice.
5.Feat 1 Desc: You gain telepathy 5, which means you can communicate mentally with creatures you can see that are within 5 squares of you. The creature must be able to speak at least one language; once you have begun the communication they can “speak” back to you if they wish. Your telepathy does not allow you to read the creature’s thoughts or influence them other than in the same manner as ordinary verbal communication.
5.Feat 2 Desc: You have the *brief mimicry* power from the Deep, Dark, Truthful Mirror discipline.
5.Feat 3 Desc: Choose a level 1 at-will attack power from your class. You gain this power in addition to the those normally granted by your class.

6.Name: Catfolk
6.Languages: Common and one extra language of your choice.
6.Feat 1 Desc: You are proficient with a martial weapon, your claws. Each claw is a martial side weapon in the light blades category (proficiency +3, 1d6 damage), although it cannot be thrown.
6.Feat 2 Desc: Allies within 10 receive a +1 ancestry bonus to Acrobatics.
6.Feat 3 Desc: +2 ancestry bonus to AC against opportunity attacks.

7.Name: Fetchling
7.Languages: Common and one extra language of your choice.
7.Feat 1 Desc: +5 ancestry bonus to Endure checks to hold your breath.
7.Feat 2 Desc: Allies within 10 receive a +1 ancestry bonus to Stealth.

8.Name: Gnoll
8.Feat 1 Desc: Add your Constitution modifier to your recovery value.
8.Feat 2 Desc: You are proficient with a martial weapon, your claws. Your bite is a martial one-handed weapon in the heavy blades category (proficiency +3, 1d8 damage), although it requires no hands to use.

9.Name: Grynloc
9.Feat 1 Desc: You can, to a range of 12 squares, see invisible creatures and objects, automatically detect visual illusions and succeed on saving throws against them, and perceive the original form of a shapechanger or a creature that is transformed by magic.
9.Feat 2 Desc: Once per encounter, you can use *shape magic* or *distraction*.

10.Name: Half-Giant
10.Feat 1 Desc: You have a +2 ancestry bonus to checks to escape a grapple. When you are the target of any attack or power that has a different effect based on the target’s size, you may choose to be treated as size Large instead of size Medium for the purposes of that attack.
10.Feat 2 Desc: You may reduce any unwilling movement you are subject to by 1 square. When you would fall prone as the result of an attack, make a saving throw – on a success, you do not fall.

11.Name: Hobgoblin
11.Feat 1 Desc: +1 ancestry bonus on attacks against staggered enemies.
11.Feat 2 Desc: You have proficiency with martial weapons in the heavy blades category.

12.Name: Mephit
12.Description: Small elemental humanoid (fire, water, earth or air)
12.Details: Choose one: fire (resistance to fire), water (resistance to cold), earth (resistance to acid) or air (resistance to lightning and thunder)
12.Feat 1 Desc: You have a fly speed of 6, but you fall at the end of your turn and your maximum altitude is 1.
12.Feat 2 Desc: Resistance to the specified damage type(s) 5 + half your level.

13.Name: Minotaur
13.Languages: Common and one extra language of your choice.
13.Feat 1 Desc: When you are the target of an attack with the Psychic tag, the attacker is rattled (save ends).
13.Feat 2 Desc: When you charge, you do not need to move in a straight line.

14.Name: Rook
14.Feat 1 Desc: You do not make death saving throws. You still die if reduced to negative hit points equal to your maximum hit points. While unconscious, you do not need to breathe nor do you get hungrier or thirstier.
14.Feat 3 Desc: Each rook has one of the following powers: *soften* or *gargoyle's rest*.

15.Name: Selkmay
15.Languages: Common and one extra language of your choice.
15.Feat 1 Desc: You can speak with riverine and ocean-going mammals and water birds.
15.Feat 2 Desc: You can use *animal form* once a day.

16.Name: Shadow Elf
16.Feat 1 Desc: You know the *ghost sound* power from the Cantrips discipline.
16.Feat 2 Desc: You don’t need to sleep. Instead, you meditate deeply, remaining semiconscious, for 4 hours a day. While meditating, you can dream after a fashion; such dreams are actually mental exercises that have become reflexive through years of practice. Your 4-hour trance has the same effect as a 6-hour long rest.

17.Name: Vishya
17.Details: Vishyas are graceful humanoids with venomous fangs and serpentine eyes. Their supple skin is covered with tiny scales, often of a light green, which are sometimes arrayed in patterns not unlike those of a serpent.
17.Feat 1 Desc: +5 ancestry bonus to Endure checks to hold your breath.
17.Feat 2 Desc: Mud, marsh and shallows are not difficult terrain for you.
17.Feat 3 Desc: Vishya can communicate using high-pitch whistles that adults cannot hear but dogs and children can.

18.Name: Cervitaur
18.Feat 1 Desc: Shrubbery, trees or plants are not difficult terrain for you.

19.Name: Quickling
19.Feat 1 Desc: When you make an initiative check, if you are in cover or concealment, you can make a Stealth check to hide (takes no action).

20.Name: Azer
20.Speed: 5 squares, but your speed is not reduced by wearing heavy armor or carrying a heavy load.
20.Feat 1 Desc: You gain resistance to fire equal to 5 + half your level.
20.Feat 2 Desc: You know the *fiery spirit* power from the Cantrips discipline.

21.Name: Frogfolk
21.Languages: Common and one extra language of your choice.
21.Feat 1 Desc: When you make an initiative check, if you are in cover or concealment, you can make a Stealth check to hide (takes no action).
21.Feat 2 Desc: +2 ancestry bonus to AC against opportunity attacks.

22.Name: Hoddydod (Snailfolk)
22.Languages: Common and one extra language of your choice.
22.Feat 1 Desc: After each short rest you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier (2 + Con at level 11, 5 + Con at level 21).
